welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fenton, a charming and vibrant city known for its friendly locals, beautiful parks, and delicious food. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Fenton has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bishop International Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the only concourse at Bishop International Airport and is home to gates A1-A6.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
